attributes.action: To make someone within the social services in Haringey responsible for the death of Baby P
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This was a catastrophic failure of the social services within our country not just one area. Somebody should have known something was wrong, the child was on the protection register for 8 whole months.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
